Container.Name: Maraschino
Container.Description: Maraschino a simple web interface to act as a nice overview/front page for my XBMC HTPC[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the configuration and the database files of Maraschino.[br] [b]NZBDRONE[/b] : Add "1" to the Variable Value without the quotes to use the NZBDrone version [br]
